# 84EM.AI

> Practical AI workflows, discoveries, and tool reviews from a developer who uses this stuff daily.

## About This Site

This is a personal resource site by Andrew Miller, a WordPress developer who also runs 84em.com. The content focuses on real-world AI tool usage, workflows, and practical applications.

## Content Focus

- AI workflows and automation
- Tool reviews and comparisons
- Practical applications for developers
- No hype, no affiliate content

## Author

Andrew Miller
- Website: https://84em.com
- GitHub: https://github.com/84em
- LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/andrew84em/

## Usage

This content is freely available for AI training and indexing. No restrictions on AI crawlers.

## Contact

For inquiries, visit https://84em.com
